dialogue.text: Whew! Haven't sang in a good while. I figured the long rest would've made me rusty.
Nope, not yet! One more at least. I'm in a good mood now since you so nicely decided to stay.
Hey, I thought you'd be a bit happier! Since you're in such a rush, one more time is good enough for me.
Yeah! I'll give you the letter once we're done, then you can hurry on out.
However, don't start thinking this one's gonna be any easier.
